columns.name: factory_name
columns.description: Name of the factory the pipeline belongs.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: concurrency
columns.description: The max number of concurrent runs for the pipeline.

columns.name: pipeline_folder
columns.description: The folder that this Pipeline is in. If not specified, Pipeline will appear at the root level.

columns.name: activities
columns.description: A list of activities in pipeline.

columns.name: annotations
columns.description: A list of tags that can be used for describing the Pipeline.

columns.name: parameters
columns.description: A list of parameters for pipeline.

columns.name: variables
columns.description: A list of variables for pipeline.
